title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description:
This RFC aims to gather and document comprehensive project requirements for the Holographic Ad Network. Key areas of focus include: 
1. Types of holographic advertisements (static, interactive, immersive) 
2. Target public spaces (malls, stadiums, airports) 
3. Desired user interactions (gesture recognition, voice commands, QR code scanning, eye-tracking) 
4. Analytics/tracking needs (impression tracking, click-through rates, dwell time, geolocation data for targeted ads, heatmaps, conversion rates) 
5. Additional features such as customization options for advertisers, privacy controls, accessibility considerations, and user feedback mechanisms. Technical specifications for holographic projection systems (hardware requirements, software support), network infrastructure requirements (bandwidth, latency, redundancy), potential integration with existing advertising platforms, and scalability considerations are also addressed. Additionally, security concerns (data protection, privacy regulations) will be tackled, along with the exploration of machine learning applications to enhance ad targeting and user experience. The RFC is currently in REVIEW_IN_PROGRESS state.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for serving holographic ads, tracking user interactions, and collecting analytics data.

title: Develop Ad Serving and Rendering Components
description: Implement the components responsible for serving and rendering holographic advertisements in public spaces.

title: Implement User Interaction Tracking
description: Develop the components and mechanisms for tracking user interactions with the holographic advertisements.

title: Build Analytics and Reporting System
description: Create the system for collecting, storing, and analyzing user interaction data and generating reports and insights.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management solutions for storing and retrieving holographic ad content, user interaction data, and analytics reports.

title: Develop Security and Privacy Measures
description: Implement security and privacy measures to protect user data and ensure the system's integrity.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application to production environments.

title: Conduct System Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the system's functionality and reliability.
dependencies: Develop Ad Serving and Rendering Components
Set up Data Storage and Management

title: Create User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop user guides, tutorials, and training materials to assist users in effectively utilizing the holographic ad network.
dependencies: Conduct System Testing and Quality Assurance
